2101410.name: Lost Beyond
2101410.description:
About the game




Lost Beyond now offers 2 gamemodes!

The Story

  • A short Adventure Exploration game, where you play as a hiker whose entire reality is about to shift.

    A harmless trip to Canyons is about to unveil great mysteries, after you get trapped in underground caves. While trying to find a way out, you find a way in. A portal which takes you to alternate dimension, where reality is not like we know it.

    Find your way through a mysterious environment, piece together the clues that can lead you where you truly want to be, and try to hold it together while the Universe tests your worthiness. But be aware, not everything is as it seems to be.

    Are you ready for an adventure?

    The Forest Freeroam

  • The latest addition to Lost Beyond is the Forest Freeroam. Complete freedom in the most advanced and realistic forest landscape, with fully dynamic weather and seasons, procedural nature and no limits whatsoever!

    - Additional Features of this gamemode include a Building System, Crafting, Player Inventory, Animals, Fighting and much more!

    If you feel like getting lost in this world and open your imagination, make sure to try out Forest Freeroam!


    Features

    • Two Gamemodes!
    • Next-Gen graphics
    • Open World
    • Smooth Performance
    • Unique and relaxing gameplay
    • Nanite and Lumen technology
2101410.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
